name: FOR THY FLESH | Forest Grunge Vol.1 | The Hare
name_original: FOR THY FLESH | Forest Grunge Vol.1 | The Hare
description:
This is a digital Tattoo Flash Zine. In this little book are various designs I created between 2021 and 2023, intended for use as tattoo. 16 designs in total.

Upon purchase of this zine, you are granted permission to use any of these designs for the sole purpose of tattoo.

Please bare in mind that:

  •  You will have to find someone to actually tattoo these designs onto you.
  •  Purchase does not cover the cost of someone tattooing these works on you.
  •  Because this is flash, other people might also end up having these designs tattooed onto them as well.

Thank you kindly for supporting my work! If you have any additional questions, feel free to reach out to me via email at tombofnull@gmail.com

—LJ Osborne AKA TOMBOFNULL
